channel.title: Coding problem.. wtf?
channel.description:
K.. well I just put my new background picture up.. and this popped up.. idk what i did wrong.. the last thing I edited was my EGUI and changed it from epic-server.no-ip.org to 127.0.0.1.. can someone tell me whats wrong please?
K well I know its not the ip that I changed because I just changed it back to my epic-server.no-ip.org and it still giving me the same problem. So cross that out
[CODE]Epic-Scape Client Made by Nativejim Error: loaderror Starting up 20 urlstream Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method8(client.java:4612) at Applet_Sub1.method3(Applet_Sub1.java:146) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:140) at client.run(client.java:4392) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception in thread "AWT-EventQueue-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method8(client.java:4612) at Applet_Sub1.method3(Applet_Sub1.java:146) at Applet_Sub1.destroy(Applet_Sub1.java:198) at Applet_Sub1.windowClosing(Applet_Sub1.java:431) at java.awt.Window.processWindowEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Window.processEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Component.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Container.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Window.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Component.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpOneEventForFilters(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForFilter(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForHierarchy(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.run(Unknown Source) [/CODE]

item.title: Coding problem.. wtf?
item.dc:creator: @0bbyme 0bbyme
item.description:
@0bbyme wrote:

go to client.java line 4612 with net beans or something and see what the problem is. and do the same with the rest of the exeptions.

Read full topic

K… well I just put my new background picture up… and this popped up… idk what i did wrong… the last thing I edited was my EGUI and changed it from epic-server.no-ip.org to 127.0.0.1… can someone tell me whats wrong please?
